title: CME Group Beats Expectations as Earnings Soar
text:
By Robert Barba

CME Group Inc. (CME) reported a surge in net income on higher revenue in its latest quarter.

The derivatives marketplace reported third-quarter net income of $636.3 million, or $1.78 a share, compared with $411.8 million, or $1.21 a share a year earlier.

Adjusted earnings were $1.90 a share. Analysts polled by FactSet expected $1.76 a share.

Revenue was $1.28 billion, up from $904.2 million a year earlier. Analysts expected $1.27 billion in revenue.

Clearing and transaction fees totaled $1.04 billion, up from $752.5 million a year earlier.

Write to Robert Barba at robert.barba@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 30, 2019 07:35 ET (11:35 GMT)
